item.title: Farmers’ Mental Health Crumbles Under Climate Strain
item.description: Nearly half of UK farmers say they lack access to formal mental health support as floods and droughts fuel growing climate anxiety. Medscape News UK

item.title: Will There Be Enough GPs Left in 5 Years?
item.description: Nearly a third of UK GPs say they are unlikely to still be working in general practice in 5 years, with stress and workload pushing many to leave. Med...

item.title: SJS/TEN Survivors Face Long-Term Burden
item.description: A US study finds that survivors of Stevens-Johnson syndrome and toxic epidermal necrolysis face lasting physical, psychological, and social effects an...

item.title: Phase 3 Data Support Oral Therapy for Psoriasis
item.description: A novel oral therapy that inhibits the interleukin-23 inflammatory pathway provided control of moderate-to-severe psoriasis at a level similar to a bi...

item.title: Lives Lost to America’s Blood Pressure Divide
item.description: About 58% of Black adults in the US have high blood pressure. Medscape Medical News
